Text: Game works fine in both windows xp and mac in dosbox with windows 3.1 installed, couldnt get it to work straight in xp though. USE DOSBOX WITH WINDOWS 3.1
game works fine in xp i used the file STARW16 didnt need to use dos box
Works fine on Win XP SP3, installed normally, then copied the movies to the install folder. The Ranchcam doesn't work at all for me, though.
